segments.text: Hello , ladies . I'm firing up the grill . We can eat in an hour or so .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Chips , finger foods , desserts , baked beans . Where're the pork and beef strips ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yi-jun , we're in the States . Here it's all burgers , steaks , and dogs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah ... hence the buns and condiments we bought . And this is Holly's potato salad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can put stuff on the picnic table . Back to work . The grill is calling me ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me know if I can help .
segments.speaker: S2
